casebody.data:
Cuff BROWN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 25, 2017

David J. Reich, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Adam E. Matter, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Cliff Brown's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 903, 150 A.3d 766 (2016), is denied.
